scripts.build: sh -c 'if [ "$BUILD_TARGET" = "frontend" ]; then npm --prefix frontend ci --include=dev && npm --prefix frontend run build && rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && cp -r frontend/dist/. build/; else npm --prefix server ci && (npm --prefix server run build || echo no-build); fi'
scripts.build:server: npm --prefix server ci && (npm --prefix server run build || echo no-build)
scripts.build:frontend: npm --prefix frontend ci --include=dev && npm --prefix frontend run build
